briefTitle: Study to Test a Marketed Product in the Treatment of Migraine-associated Nausea

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 6-month history of migraine, moderate to severe migraine attacks with nausea, 1-6 migraine attacks per month

Exclusion Criteria:

* Heart disease, high blood pressure

outcomeMeasures.title: Participants With Elimination of Nausea at 2 Hours Postdose
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants reporting the absence of nausea at 2 hours post treatment. Absence or presence of nausea was recorded by the participants in an electronic diary. Absence is defined as no nausea at 2 hours post-treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Participants With Pain Relief at 2 Hours Postdose
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants reporting pain relief defined as a reduction of pain severity from grades 2 or 3 (moderate or severe pain) at baseline to grades 0 or 1 (no headache or mild pain) at 2 hours after treatment.
